sentence.Network_en: Its proposed signal is a hybrid, part analog and part digital.
sentence.Network_cn: 其拟议中的信号是一种部分模拟与部分数字的混合波导联结.

sentence.Network_en: The voltage may provides an analog representation of the temperature difference.
sentence.Network_cn: 电压可以成为温差的模拟表示.

sentence.Network_en: Digital networks are considerably less subjected to noise than analog networks.
sentence.Network_cn: 数字网络不象模拟网络那样易受噪音干扰.

sentences.en: Analog computers are generalpurpose devices which employ laws of physics for performing mathematical operations.
